title: Largest Odd Divisor
text:
Given a non-negative integersN. You have to find the largest odd divisor ofN.InputInput starts with an integerT (1 ≤ T ≤ 5000)denoting the number of test cases. Each test case contains an integerN (1 ≤ N ≤ 1012).OutputFor each test case print the case number and the largest odd divisor ofN.ExampleInput:2
2
10Output:Case 1: 1
Case 2: 5Problem Setter: Md Abdul Alim, Dept. of Computer Science, Bangladesh University of Business & Technology
